title: Interpretation of a dream about a falling tusk in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Nabulsi

preview.html: Dreaming of falling fangs is one of the most surprising and terrifying dreams for the dreamer, but there are several interpretations related to this dream, and through this article we will list all the interpretations related to this dream by mentioning the opinions of different scholars on its interpretation. Interpretation of a dream about a falling fang in a dream Seeing a fang falling or falling out in a dream has a different interpretation if it is from the upper layer of teeth than if it is from the lower layer of teeth. In general, teeth in a dream indicate what life contains of money, debts, or good or bad livelihoods. A dream about teeth falling out without bleeding symbolizes the dreamer's longevity, but pulling teeth with bleeding indicates the zakat of money, but if the dreamer is a girl, the interpretation of this dream is her reaching maturity and moving to a new era. As for the one who dreams that his teeth have fallen out and are rotten, this dream is interpreted as a good condition for this fortune teller, but if they fall into his hand, his dream indicates the care of God (Glory be to Him). For him. Seeing teeth falling out in a dream symbolizes the long life of the visionary, and if the dreamer dreams that his teeth fell on his sleeve or stone, the meaning of the dream is that he will live until his teeth fall out and the number of his family grows. As for the one who dreams that all his teeth have fallen out, and he does not see them in the dream, this means the death of all his family members in front of him. O seer, God gives him money, and it may symbolize a male child, but his falling to the ground indicates death. As for the lower teeth falling out in a dream, it symbolizes anxiety and sadness, but if the seer is in debt, this dream promises him to pay off his debts. Confused and do not find an interpretation that reassures you? Search on Google for the Egyptian dream interpretation site. Interpretation of seeing a canine tooth falling out in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin mentioned several positive and negative interpretations of this vision: First, the positive interpretations Whoever dreams that he has pulled out a canine tooth from his upper teeth and that this canine tooth has fallen into his lap, he will be blessed with a male child. Seeing teeth falling out in a dream symbolizes the repayment of debts, and whoever dreams of only one tooth falling out, this dream is good news for paying off his debts in one go. Whoever dreams that his upper teeth are falling out, his dream symbolizes that a lot of money will come to him. Whoever sees in a dream that he pulled out a molar and this tooth fell into his hand, the dream indicates the reconciliation of this dreamer with one of his competitors from his relatives. Second, negative interpretations Whoever dreams that he pulled out a molar from the upper layer of his teeth and this molar tooth fell to the ground, this dream indicates the death of the dreamer. Whoever sees in a dream that all of his teeth have fallen to the ground, this dream may symbolize the death of his family before him, or it may symbolize their exposure to hardships and worries, or their exposure to diseases. Dreaming that his teeth fall out and then he collects them in his hand, his dream may indicate the death of one of his children. If a person dreams that his teeth fall out and he cannot eat in his dream, this dream symbolizes his exposure to poverty. Falling of the canine tooth in a dream by Ibn Sirin Interpretation of the dream of falling teeth by Al-Nabulsi Al-Nabulsi says: Whoever dreams that his teeth have fallen out, and he finds them after they have fallen out, the meaning of his dream is an increase in his lifespan

Interpretation of seeing a tusk falling out in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin mentioned several positive and negative interpretations of this vision: First, the positive interpretations: Whoever dreams that a tusk has been extracted from his upper teeth and that this tusk has fallen into his lap, then he will have a male child. Seeing teeth falling out in a dream symbolizes paying off debts. Whoever dreams of falling out for only one year, then this dream is good news for paying off his debts in one go. Whoever dreams that his upper teeth are falling out, his dream symbolizes that a lot of money will come to him. Whoever sees in In a dream that he extracted a molar and this tooth fell into his hand, then the dream indicates that this dreamer is reconciling with one of his rivals among his relatives. If a person dreams that his teeth are falling out and he cannot eat in his dream, then this dream symbolizes his exposure to poverty. A tusk falling out in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about teeth falling out by Al-Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi says: Whoever dreams that his teeth fell out, and finds them after they fell out, the meaning of his dream is an increase in his lifespan.

title: What is the difference between dream and vision according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Many people wonder about the difference between a dream and a vision. The truth is that despite the confusion, we find that the difference between them is very clear, even though both a dream and a vision share that they speak to a person in his sleep, and there is little confusion and ambiguity in the difference between a dream and a vision. A vision we find of the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace. You may also be interested in learning about butterflies in a dream. He explained the difference between them when he said: A dream is from Satan and a vision is from God Almighty. Then we discuss the difference between a dream and a vision in detail. The siren difference between a vision and a dream. A dream is a vision, but the dream is the devil’s game, so the vision Kindness is from God, and God knows best. The effects of a vision according to Ibn Sirin. A vision is a message from God to man, which could be a warning or fear of something. Parts of a vision are a warning vision from Satan, a speech from the spirit, and God knows best. The difference between a dream and a vision, as explained by the Messenger, as we referred to the difference. Previously, the Holy Prophet said that the dream is from Satan and the vision is from God Almighty, so dreams can have an interpretation, as happened to the king of Egypt when he dreamed of seven fat cows. He eats seven ears of corn, seven green ears and one dry one. This is what the king’s servant who was with our master Joseph did. In prison, remember that our master Joseph was a scholar of dream interpretation, and God knows best. He explained to him his dream of becoming a waiter for the king one day, and he said to the king: I will direct you to someone who will explain that to you. So they went to our master Joseph, peace be upon him, to explain his visions to the king and reveal to him the secret with the knowledge of God Almighty. Accusing our master Omar bin Al-Khattab, while wearing a shirt, that he was dragging him. Read more: Interpretation of seeing cakes in a dream. Definition of vision. To clarify the difference between a dream and a vision in detail, we will first define the definition of a dream and find that a vision differs from dreams in that it is divided into two parts: a part that all people share, which is The general visions that all people see, Muslim and unbeliever, and God knows best. And there is a section that is specific to the Muslim only, which is the good dream, and it is considered one of the good news that God Almighty spoke about in His Book, that He gives thanks for certainty, this is what God Almighty (peace be upon him) said. It is good news for the life of this world and the hereafter) and God knows best. Definition of a dream A dream is defined as what a person sees during his sleep, as it includes witnessing events that include places and people that occurred in reality and may not be related to reality. Especially in the case of frightening events in which Satan wants to frighten a Muslim and disturb his comfort, and this is always his primary goal, and God knows best. Read more: Interpretation of seeing intense crying in a dream The difference between a dreamer and a vision according to Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that there is much evidence that what a person sees in A dream denotes a vision and not a dream. The vision conveys a message to the dreamer or a warning about something that will happen and the dreamer must wake up remembering everything. Details of what happened in this vision. Only God knows. The vision does not include any of the daily scenes or events that the viewer experiences in his life or occupies his mind. If that happens, then what the person saw is not a vision but a dream. Whoever sees it does not become afflicted with the disease.

title: Learn more about the 30 most important interpretations of seeing a dream about soap in a dream by leading scholars

preview.html: What you do not know about the interpretation of seeing soap in a dream by leading scholars: There is no doubt that soap is one of the important things in our lives in order to complete physical hygiene, but when we see it in a dream, it carries many and branching connotations, including connotations that are interpreted in the short term and other connotations in the future. In the long term, with an Egyptian website, you will learn with us the most important interpretations of this vision. Read the following to interpret your vision. Soap in a dream Commentators said that soap in a dream is a good sign for the dreamer to increase his money and increase his business profits, and if he sees that he is taking a full bath and using water and soap to clean his body, this means that he will be cleansed of his sins through repentance and will be saved from his illness, and thus comfort and happiness will come after To cleanse his life of all its impurities. If the dreamer washes his face in the dream, this vision is related to the comfort that he lacks, and God will return it to him again. God willing, washing the face in a dream is one of the symbols that confirm that the dreamer is one of those with pure intentions for God, as he loves to help people without taking anything from them in return. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he has begun to wash and use soap to clean his body of any plankton, then this The vision is a transition for the dreamer from life to life, which means that if he is a sinner, he will move from a forbidden life to a life of forgiveness and repentance to God. If a married woman sees soap in her dream, this is evidence that she will break the barrier of boredom in her life and enjoy renewal because the element of excitement and excitement In her life it will increase, and this vision also indicates the high quality and praiseworthy morals and education that the dreamer has. But if the married woman in her dream bathes with water and soap, then this vision means that she is pure and does not envy her and does not envy anyone because she is satisfied with God’s provision for her, and this He will make her feel like he is him. The richest man on earth. The Egyptian site is the largest dream interpretation site in the Arab world. All you have to do is type the Egyptian dream interpretation site in Google and get the correct interpretations. Soap in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq. Imam Al-Sadiq explained that if the dreamer sees in his dream that his clothes are dirty and he washes them with water And soap, then this vision will only bring goodness to the dreamer, and this goodness was not intended for this specific place in. Life but it will be generally good in all aspects of his life if he is unhappy in his job. God will honor him with comfort and money, and all his troubles with family or friends will end, and he will soon reach a stage of mental clarity free of all troubles and extreme reconciliation with himself. Interpretation of a dream about colored soap: If a married woman uses green soap in a dream, this is evidence that her body will come back strong. From God as it was and the disease present in him will disappear soon. Interpreters indicated that if the dreamer sees pieces of soap in his dream in multiple colors, this is evidence that God will grant him offspring of both sexes and he will give birth to many boys and girls. Interpretation of a dream about soap

title: Interpretation of dreams of seeing a sister in a dream by Ibn Sirin and the great commentators

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a sister in a dream There are many interpretations about seeing a sister in a dream. There are many interpretations that carry many connotations depending on the situation in which the dreamer was. Interpretation scholars have made many interpretations about the group of interpretations that the dreams revolve around. It has included many interpretations on the subject of dream interpretation of seeing a sister in a dream. We will explain to you the interpretations that went into it. Interpretation of seeing a sister in a dream. The presence of a sister in the house is a big thing that can happen several times or a second, and this is what we see in many relationships between brothers. To interpret the dream of seeing Sister in a dream We explain the following points to you: Seeing a sister in a dream is generally considered a sign of good news and happiness for the pioneer. The interpretation of the dream of seeing a sister in a dream, and exactly as a sister, if a woman or even a man sees her, is evidence of the passion and strength of the bond between them. As for seeing A sister in a man’s dream is a sign of sustenance and a bond of compassion. Just as a sister in a dream shows peace of mind, happiness, affirmation, and joy. See also the interpretation of a dream of seeing twins in a dream for a married and unmarried woman by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream of seeing a half-sister in a dream. The older sister enjoys an excellent position in the house Family, as she often has a lot of responsibility that she can act as a second mother to the siblings. In this context, we will clarify some interpretations about seeing your half-sister in a dream as follows: Seeing your half-sister in a dream can mean something good or bad. Just as seeing the dreamer’s half-sister hitting him in the dreamer’s dream is evidence that there will be Good news between them. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a sister in a dream. In the same context, if the dreamer hits his sister in a dream, this indicates that there will be problems that will arise between them. Just like this vision can warn its owner of worries. See also the interpretation of a dream about seeing a farm in a dream For the single and married person, Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a naked sister in a dream by Ibn Sirin: We have many dreams in a dream, some of which are happy, and some of which are frightening and strange, as seeing a naked sister in a dream is one of the dreams that does not bode well for its owner, and based on that, we present to you the interpretations resulting from this dream as follows: A fortune teller seeing his sister naked in a dream is a warning of poverty, failure or loss. In the same context, this vision indicates difficulties that reveal what was in the past. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a sister in a dream and this dream also indicates the emergence of many problems that cannot be solved or controlled On it. See also the interpretation of a dream about seeing a dead head kissed in a dream for a single woman and a married woman according to Ibn Sirin. Seeing my dead sister pregnant in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about seeing a sister in a dream. There are many different interpretations of seeing a sister in a dream, and this difference depends on the situation in which the sister was in the dream. As well as the case of the fortuneteller, and therefore we explain to you the following interpretations: Seeing your sister in a dream when she is dead is evidence

title: Learn about the 6 most important interpretations of seeing a gorilla in a dream

preview.html: Interpretations of Ibn Sirin and leading scholars for seeing a gorilla in a dream: The gorilla is an animal from the ape family, its weight exceeds 350 kilograms, it does not like to be in the middle of crowds of people, but it is an introverted animal that loves isolation, it has tremendous physical strength, and it is not recommended to stand in front of it as an enemy because it will be an aggressive creature and your sword, So, introduce us to the interpretation of seeing a gorilla in a dream. Gorilla in a dream Seeing a gorilla in a dream for an unmarried young man means that he will fall victim to an intense fear of the subject of sexual intercourse and enter into a love relationship for personal reasons related to him, which may be due to his lack of self-confidence. Or his fear of loving someone who does not deserve love or his fear of being separated from the one he loves. If a boy dreams of a gorilla in his dream, the dream will mean that his mother is a very cruel woman in her relationship with him and does not give him the love and tenderness that any mother gives to her children, but rather uses her method of violence. And physical and moral punishment with him, and this inhuman treatment will make the dreamer a disturbed person who is unable to confront others and fears that he will receive the same punishment that he received from his mother. Similar to the previous vision, if the husband dreams of a gorilla in his dream, the vision will interpret that his wife is a cruel and violent woman towards him. Do not respect him or share in the prosperity and misfortunes of life. . It makes the husband a prey to every woman with evil intentions. If the dreamer sees a gorilla in front of him in a dream and feels panic, the interpretation of this dream means that the dreamer is not safe in his life, but he will get protection from others soon. A big monkey in a dream means that the dreamer has a relationship with a friend who Obscenity and that the dreamer's friendship with him will affect him negatively, and this may be a reason for the dreamer to live a period of pain and anxiety because this person is not like that. Friendship deserves.. Shameful betrayal, and all these things are enough to make God sad and sad for a long time. What is the interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s dream of a black gorilla? A black gorilla in a dream by Ibn Sirin means that the dreamer will soon be exposed to fraud. If the dreamer dreams that he received a gift in his sleep and it was If the dreamer in a dream cooks a meal of gorilla meat and sees himself eating it, then this vision means that the dreamer will obtain his money from sources that contradict the words of God and His Messenger, and he knows that. Forbidden, but he ignores it. case and continues to win it. If the dreamer is able to catch a heavy gorilla in his dream, then this dream indicates that the dreamer will meet a magician soon, and this magician will be the reason for the dreamer to obtain great benefit. Gorilla in a dream Al-Osaimi Al-Osaimi confirmed that if the dreamer sees that he gets married From a monkey, this dream is nothing but a major sin committed by the dreamer, and he must hasten to seek forgiveness and repent because the person does not know the date of his death. And he must be ready to meet God at any moment. If the dreamer dreams of a brown monkey and he dies in the dream, this vision is praiseworthy, and it means that the oppression and oppression that befell the dreamer will die and end, and it will end.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing an ambulance in a dream

preview.html: Dream that you see an ambulance, a method used to provide initial treatment to a patient who will be sent to the hospital and first aid is provided in emergency situations. When we see the meaning of an ambulance in a dream, it definitely shows signs and it is clear that many famous researchers and lawyers will understand it in detail, as the ambulance indicates concern for health and can mean good health, longevity, happiness and materialism. Ethical and much more. When you hear the sound of sirens, it is a sign of stress and anxiety in the dreamer's life. Seeing an ambulance carrying a patient and receiving treatment in a dream is a symbol of a way to help the dreamer alleviate his troubles and problems. Interpretation of a dream about an ambulance by Ibn Sirin: Ibn Sirin mentioned in his explanation that he saw an ambulance in his dream, which indicates a positive change in his life and future decisions. In addition to Therefore, an ambulance in a dream symbolizes receiving help from a specific person. An ambulance in a dream symbolizes recovery from illness. If the dreamer sees a black ambulance, this means that he should be careful and take care of his health, as he may suffer from illnesses and illnesses. The vision indicates An ambulance in a dream indicates longevity. In addition, seeing an ambulance in a dream can bring happiness and inner peace to the dreamer. When you hear the sound of sirens, it is a sign of stress and anxiety in the dreamer’s life. Interpretation of a dream about an ambulance for a single woman: Seeing a girl A single woman driving an ambulance indicates that she is on the verge of achieving her goals and dreams. This also indicates that driving an ambulance shows that she has reduced the risks and problems she has faced in her life. As for seeing single women carrying several patients in ambulances, there are indications that they are facing some risks. Health. Hearing an ambulance in her dream is a sign of her happiness. Interpretation of a dream about an ambulance for a married woman: A married woman’s perception of an ambulance in a married woman’s dream indicates that the next is better and that you will overcome difficulties. Seeing an ambulance for a married woman in her dream also symbolizes feeling With safety. This indicates the desirability of seeing an ambulance for a married woman, as it is news of the arrival of good goods. Seeing an ambulance in a married woman’s dream indicates the disappearance of worries and problems. Interpretation of a dream about an ambulance for a man: Hearing a man’s dream about an ambulance seems to ignore his health, so he should Be careful. Dream of seeing an ambulance Seeing the sound of an ambulance in a dream is a sign of bad behavior. Seeing an ambulance in a dream shows that this is really easy. Seeing an ambulance in a dream for a man in a dream indicates the disappearance of fears and problems that he has faced throughout his life. If Seeing an ambulance during one's sleep is evidence that it reduces anxiety and pain. Seeing a man in a dream driving an ambulance, after a period of sadness and depression, brings psychological comfort to a pregnant woman. Seeing an ambulance carrying a patient and being treated in a dream is a symbol of a way to help the patient.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a phone for a single or married man

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a phone by Ibn Sirin: If the dreamer sees that he is talking to someone on the phone, this is a sign of happy news. Seeing a phone in a dream is evidence of a change in personal circumstances for the better. Seeing a phone in black and white is a sign of good things that will come. Interpretation Dream of a phone for Nablus: You lost your phone inside the dream. It portends bad and bad news. Dropping the phone from the dreamer indicates worry and anxiety. Interpretation of a dream about a phone for a man: If you see a young man buying a black phone in a dream, it means that he will face some problems. Seeing buying a red phone is a good sign and hearing good news. Seeing yourself selling phones in a dream is evidence of earning a living and profit from trade. A man who sees a phone in a dream is a sign of a great relationship. Seeing a black phone in a dream is a sign of unpleasant news. For a man to talk on the phone in a dream is evidence that he has intentions Honest. When a man sees that he is buying a mobile phone in a dream, he earns a lot of money. A broken phone in a man’s dream is a sign of crises and problems. Interpretation of a dream about a phone for a married woman. Seeing a phone in a married woman’s dream is a sign of a happy and joyful life. A phone in a dreamMarried / MarriedDetails Pregnancy with a male child. A broken phone in a married woman’s dream indicates problems and obstacles that she is going through. Selling a phone in a married woman’s dream is evidence of disagreements between her and her husband. If he sees someone breaking the phone, he will be vulnerable to contracting illness. Interpretation of a dream about a phone for a pregnant woman: a vision A white phone in a dream shows the good that will come to her. A white phone indicates an easy birth. A broken phone in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence of the problems and exhaustion that she goes through during pregnancy. If he sees that he broke the phone and reassembled it, this indicates that he has overcome some problems. Interpretation of a dream about a phone for a single woman: Seeing a phone in a dream is not related. Evidence of kindness and its connection to a person of good character. Seeing an unmarried woman talking on the phone indicates her marriage to someone who loves her very much. If a girl sees that she is texting on the phone, she will face many problems. A white phone in a girl’s dream indicates Her engagement and hearing the happy news. The phone shows the girl’s marriage to a moral man. title: Interpretation of swimming in a pool in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing swimming in a pool in a dream via the website Vision roy2a.com. Seeing yourself swimming in a pool in a dream has many meanings. Seeing it can be a good sign or an evil omen. Interpreters differed in the interpretation of seeing swimming in a pool in a dream, depending on the visionary situation and its circumstances and whether it was a single man or woman, married or pregnant. Today, through a vision site, we will discuss in detail the interpretation of seeing swimming in a pool in a dream, based on the opinion of leading interpreters such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, Al-Nabulsi and Imam Al-Sadiq, so follow us. What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of yourself swimming in a dream? Seeing swimming well in a dream indicates that the dreamer will achieve great success in his professional and personal life. Seeing swimming poorly in a dream shows that he will go through economic hardship Significant in the coming period. Seeing someone who cannot swim well in a dream indicates that he will hear good news soon. Seeing fear of falling water in a dream shows a lot of thinking about what will happen in the future and feeling nervous about it. Other related dreams: Interpretation of seeing a river And swimming in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing yourself swimming in the pool in a dream of Imam Al-Sadiq? Seeing yourself swimming in the pool and its waters were calm and clean in the dream indicates that the dreamer is living a life full of happiness, stability and contentment. Seeing yourself swimming in the pool and its waters were bad in the dream indicates the dreamer’s inability To overcome bad things in his life. What is the interpretation of seeing swimming in a pool in a dream for a single woman? Seeing in a dream an unmarried woman swimming in a good pool. It shows that they will be in a good emotional relationship, full of love, affection and understanding. Seeing unmarried women swimming in the pool was Its water is clear in a dream, and this indicates that she will marry a man with good morals and a good heart. Seeing women alone swimming in the pool and its water being cloudy in a dream shows that she will be in a relationship with a bad person who is not suitable for her. Seeing in a dream alone people drowning in a swimming pool shows that something bad will happen in the pool. Her life. Other related dreams: Interpretation of swimming in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing swimming in a pool in a dream for a married woman? Seeing a married woman swimming in a swimming pool in a dream indicates her married life full of comfort, stability and happiness. Seeing a married woman swimming in the pool and its water was clear in a dream shows the extent of Love and a strong relationship between her and her husband. Seeing a married woman swimming in the pool and its water was cloudy in a dream indicates many differences between her and her husband. What is the interpretation of seeing swimming in the pool in a dream for a pregnant woman? Seeing a pregnant woman swimming well in the pool in a dream says that she will undergo an operation Easy and affordable childbirth. Seeing a pregnant woman swimming in a swimming pool in a dream shows that you will live a stable and happy life after giving birth. Other related dreams: Interpretation of seeing an ornament and a jewel in a dream. What does it mean?

title: Interpretation of a dream about a single spacious house

preview.html: Therefore, from our translator, we will present these interpretations clearly by presenting the dream interpretation of a large house and many rooms for individuals, the dream interpretation of a beautiful spacious house, the dream interpretation of entering a large house for individuals, so follow us. Interpretation of a spacious house in a dream for a single girlIf an unmarried woman sees herself in In her dream she enters a spacious house and she is fascinated by the beauty of the house, the dream is interpreted by the progress that will occur in her life. Whether in all aspects of her life or in one aspect of it, and in both cases she will be pleased with this progress. According to another interpretation, the spacious house with multiple openings in the woman’s dream indicates An unmarried woman means many opportunities that she will have in her life. An unmarried woman who sees a spacious house in her dream is an expression of marriage to a good man. The larger the house, the more important the prospective husband is in society. If the girl is engaged and sees in her dream a house Spacious. Its walls are only stained white, and the dream may indicate the misbehavior of her fiancé, and God knows best. Seeing a spacious house in a dream for an unmarried woman is a person whose next life will be as happy and comfortable as the beauty and spaciousness of the house. If the unmarried woman is still studying and sees the spacious house in In a dream, this is a sign of success in her studies. See also: Interpretation of dreams of an old, dirty house. Interpretation of seeing a spacious house in a dream for a married woman. It is said that seeing a large house in a married woman’s dream is an expression of increasing her livelihood. And goodness in her life soon, which certainly means a much better life. In another interpretation, a married woman enters a spacious house in her dream, indicating that she will be blessed with a new baby, and God knows best. Seeing a married woman in her dream repairing the walls of a large house. The dream expressed the ability of this woman to correct family crises correctly. Interpretation of seeing a house Spacious in a dream for a divorced woman. Seeing a spacious house in a dream in the area interprets happiness and satisfaction with her life. It may also indicate that she is married and has a comfortable home and wants to have it. A divorced woman is renovating a house in her dream, as the dream expressed the dreamer’s reform of her life and her focus on developing herself in certain aspects. Read also: Interpretation of seeing entering or buying a new house in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a spacious house in a dream for a man and its meaning. The spacious house in a man’s dream is an expression of finding solutions to crises in his life and his ability to overcome them. Seeing a man in his dream that he moved to a house larger than his current house. Expression of the dream About the renewal that is happening in his life and the prosperity that he will have. The man dreamed of a spacious house, and then it began to shrink in size. The dream expressed the change in the dreamer’s material circumstances, which will be for the worse. In other interpretations, the spacious house shrank in size in the dream. An indication of an illness that may Befalling a family member or even losing one of them, and God knows best. If a man is married and dreams that he is building a large house, this represents the large offspring he will have.
